meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>rest</kanji> and the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to rest</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to relax</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: I'm going <vocabulary>to rest</vocabulary> and play some <reading>Ico</reading> (いこ) on the ol' PlayStation.
